name: My Little Monster
description:
Keep your monster alive!

Manage the 5 status bars on the bottom of the screen

The arrow keys or A/D will take you to different rooms in the facility

Interact with buttons by left clicking on them. Some buttons must be held down for several seconds

Drag items to the inventory on the bottom right to store them

Click and drag on the inventory to remove the last item you placed in there

The 5 stats that must be maintained are: 

Hunger - grab food from the food room and drop it in front of your monster

Thirst - Fill its water bowl with water from the vending machine

Cleanliness - Use the shower in the leftmost room to make your monster squeaky clean

Fun - Keep your monster entertained with toys

Radiation - Your monster needs radiation so survive. Grab uranium from the right most room by holding the button on the machine

Made by: Cole Dunham, Casey Fogwell, and Apo Koftekian for Ludum Dare 49
